languages.text: "Долг Мастера дисциплины — предвидеть любые угрозы безопасности судна. Даже столь необычные, как восстание генетических выродков, поддержанное высшим офицерством".
"It is the duty of the Master-at-Arms to anticipate any threat to the ship's safety, even one as unusual as an uprising by genetic aberrations supported by the highest-ranking officers."
languages.original_text: "Долг Мастера дисциплины — предвидеть любые угрозы безопасности судна. Даже столь необычные, как восстание генетических выродков, поддержанное высшим офицерством".

traits.locale_text: "It is the duty of the Master-at-Arms to anticipate any threat to the ship's safety, even something as unusual as a genetic anathema uprising supported by the highest-ranking officers."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: «El deber de la maestra de armas es adelantarse a cualquier amenaza para la nave, incluso una tan poco común como el alzamiento de unas aberraciones genéticas apoyado por los oficiales de mayor rango».
languages.original_text: "It is the duty of the Master-at-Arms to anticipate any threat to the ship's safety, even one as unusual as an uprising by genetic aberrations supported by the highest-ranking officers."

traits.locale_text: «El deber de la maestra de armas es adelantarse a cualquier amenaza para la nave, incluso una tan poco común como el alzamiento de unas aberraciones genéticas apoyado por los oficiales de mayor rango».
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: 「船の安全に対する脅威を予測することは、マスター・アット・アームズの義務ですから。たとえそれが、最高位の士官が支持する、遺伝的遺伝的忌まわしきものによる反乱なんて異常なことでも」
languages.original_text: "It is the duty of the Master-at-Arms to anticipate any threat to the ship's safety, even one as unusual as an uprising by genetic aberrations supported by the highest-ranking officers."

traits.locale_text: 「船の安全に対する脅威を予測することは、マスター・アット・アームズの義務ですから。たとえそれが、最高位の士官が支持する、遺伝的遺伝的忌まわしきものによる反乱なんて異常なことでも」
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: “戒律大师的职责，是预测一切可能会威胁到飞船安全的要素。哪怕是‘最高级军官发动的基因怪物叛乱’这种极其罕见的威胁，也在我的考虑范围之内。”
languages.original_text: "It is the duty of the Master-at-Arms to anticipate any threat to the ship's safety, even one as unusual as an uprising by genetic aberrations supported by the highest-ranking officers."

traits.locale_text: “戒律大师的职责，是预测一切可能会威胁到飞船安全的要素。哪怕是‘最高级军官发动的基因怪物叛乱’这种极其罕见的威胁，也在我的考虑范围之内。”
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Es ist die Pflicht der Waffenmeisterin, jede Gefahr für die Sicherheit des Schiffs vorauszusehen, selbst eine so ungewöhnliche Gefahr wie einen Aufstand genetischer Abscheulichkeiten, der von hochrangigen Offizieren unterstützt wird."
languages.original_text: "It is the duty of the Master-at-Arms to anticipate any threat to the ship's safety, even one as unusual as an uprising by genetic aberrations supported by the highest-ranking officers."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist die Pflicht der Waffenmeisterin, jede Gefahr für die Sicherheit des Schiffs vorauszusehen, selbst eine so ungewöhnliche Gefahr wie einen Aufstand genetische Abscheulichkeiten, der von hochrangigen Offizieren unterstützt wird."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: « Il est du devoir des capitaines d'armes d'anticiper tout danger qui pourrait menacer la sécurité du vaisseau, même une rébellion instiguée par une aberration génétique avec l'aide d'officiers hauts gradés. »
languages.original_text: "It is the duty of the Master-at-Arms to anticipate any threat to the ship's safety, even one as unusual as an uprising by genetic aberrations supported by the highest-ranking officers."

traits.locale_text: « Il est du devoir des capitaines d'armes d'anticiper tout danger qui pourrait menacer la sécurité du vaisseau, même une rébellion instiguée par une aberration génétique avec l'aide d'officiers hauts gradés. »
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Geminin güvenliği için tehlike arz eden şeyleri öngörmek, Silahtar'ın vazifesidir. Bu tehlike, en üst düzey subaylarca desteklenen genetik sapkıların ortaya çıkardığı başkaldırılar gibi olağan dışı şeyler olsalar bile bu böyledir."
languages.original_text: "It is the duty of the Master-at-Arms to anticipate any threat to the ship's safety, even one as unusual as an uprising by genetic aberrations supported by the highest-ranking officers."
